item.title: Monique add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Hold fast to dreams, For if dreams die Life is a broken-winged bird, That cannot fly." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Monique add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Out of the rack and ruin of our gangster death, The rape and rot of graft, and stealth, and lies, We, the people, must redeem The land, the mines, the plants, the rivers. The mountains and the endless plain-- All, all the stretch of these great green states-- And make America again!" -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Monique add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Folks, I'm telling you, birthing is hard and dying is mean- so get yourself a little loving in between." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Monique add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Turn your wounds into wisdom." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Monique add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Monique add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Everyone wants to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Monique add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I did then what I knew how to do. Now that I know better, I do better." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Monique add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "Real integrity is doing the right thing, knowing that nobodyâ€™s going to know whether you did it or not." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Monique add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "You get to know who you really are in a crisis." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: Monique add a quote by Hillary Rodham Clinton
item.description: "Every child needs a champion." -- Hillary Rodham Clinton

item.title: Monique add a quote by Hillary Rodham Clinton
item.description: "It took a Clinton to clean up after the first Bush, it may take another Clinton to clean up after the second one" -- Hillary Rodham Clinton

item.title: Monique add a quote by Bill Clinton
item.description: "There is nothing wrong with America that cannot be cured by what is right with America." -- Bill Clinton

item.title: Monique add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Monique add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Women don't want to hear what you think. Women want to hear what they think - in a deeper voice." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Monique add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Monique add a quote by Booker T. Washington
item.description: "I have learned that success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome while trying to succeed." -- Booker T. Washington

item.title: Monique add a quote by Booker T. Washington
item.description: "I will permit no man to narrow and degrade my soul by making me hate him." -- Booker T. Washington

item.title: Monique add a quote by Booker T. Washington
item.description: "The world cares little about what a man knows;it cares more about what a man is able to do." -- Booker T. Washington

item.title: Monique add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Monique add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "My alma mater was books, a good library.... I could spend the rest of my life reading, just satisfying my curiosity." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Monique add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "You're not to be so blind with patriotism that you can't face reality. Wrong is wrong, no matter who does it or says it." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Monique add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "I'm for truth, no matter who tells it. I'm for justice, no matter who it is for or against. I'm a human being, first and foremost, and as such I'm for whoever and whatever benefits humanity as a whole." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Monique add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Monique add a quote by Malcolm X
item.description: "So early in my life, I had learned that if you want something, you had better make some noise." -- Malcolm X

item.title: Monique add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Monique add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Monique add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Everybody can be great...because anybody can serve. You don't have to have a college degree to serve. You don't have to make your subject and verb agree to serve. You only need a heart full of grace. A soul generated by love." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Monique add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "A man who won't die for something is not fit to live." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Monique add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Nothing in the world is more dangerous than sincere ignorance and conscientious stupidity." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Monique add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere." -- Martin Luther King Jr.
